name: Old Edge I
detailed_description:
Old Edge I - is a simple and understandable platformer based on a classic graphics with instinctive control. In this game you will have to do different levels playing as an ancient man. There are definite things on every level. After collecting all of them a new port will open and you will able to do next level. Please, think of your every movement because the wrong action can kill your hero. To die in the game is really easy. Except for lots of traps, you will be followed by bloodthirsty flying creatures.

Don’t worry, you will achieve success! Go ahead!
